title: Email
body: So I have my account information and password, so I can sign in fine, but I forgot my email address, I'm wondering if this has any affect on if I can play in the future. and If I can get any help in changing emails because I feel insecure about not knowing some of my information.

replies.body: I suggest updating your email just in case you ever need to do a recovery, and it's always good to be prepared.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team can help with updating your info.  I hope that helps!
